Factsheet

Developer:
Sanity Fading
Based in Washington, DC
Release date:
14 Dec, 2017
Platforms:
PC / Mac
Website:
kirbycofino.com/games/AWE256/
Regular Price:
FREE

Description

You play as Sam, a film student home for break. You find that town is not as normal as you remember it to be. Collect evidence and try to save your home and your sanity from corruption!

History

This title has been long awaited since it's inception 4~ weeks ago.

Features

  • Collect video evidence of the corruption.
  • Explore a dangerous landscape.
  • Become engrossed in a story of survival.
  • Come home to C'thulu.
